Some Lesser Known Facts About Ridhima Ghosh

Does Ridhima Ghosh smoke?: No

Does Ridhima Ghosh drink alcohol?: Not Known

Ridhima Ghosh is a popular Bengali actress known for her work in the movies such as ‘Friend’, ‘Love Connection’, ‘Laptop’, ‘Bicycle Kick’, ‘Fakebook’ etc.

She wanted to become an actress since her childhood.

She acted in plays during her school and college days.

She started her acting career in 2009.

She is the first celebrity model for the FFACE Calender.
